translation.en: [Stacy] All across the world, and maybe ever since the beginning of time,

translation.it: le culture celebrano in modi diversi la maggiore età.

translation.en: There's the quinceañera.
-There's Sweet 16. -[indistinct laughter]
[Stacy] There's also something called land diving.
translation.it: e persino il tuffo nel vuoto.

translation.en: there's this thing called a bullet ant initiation
where fire ants crawl all over your hands and bite you.
translation.it: in cui ci si fa mordere le mani dalle formiche rosse.

translation.en: And if you can handle the pain, you're ready to be a man.

translation.en: I told him if he thinks that sounds bad,
try being a girl in middle school.

translation.en: All right, mishpachah,
please say hello to our newest and most fabulous adult,

translation.en: [Stacy, narrating] Your Bat Mitzvah is the first day of your adult life,

translation.en: and everyone knows an iconic adult life hinges on how it starts.
translation.it: e si sa che un'iconica vita da adulti dipende tutta da come inizia.

translation.en: [Stacy, continuing] The theme.
-The food. -[girl] Can I get one?
[Stacy] The entrance video.
It all tells a story.
Who do I want to be?
Will I have amazing lifelong friends like Lydia Rodriguez Katz?

translation.en: from your awesome older sister Ronnie?

Go Stacy! That's my sister!

translation.en: I'm pretty sure I saw Hailey Bieber wearing the exact same one.

translation.en: [softly] Oh cool. Okay. Bye.
That was weird.
-I love and hate them at the same time. -[sighing] Yeah.
translation.it: - Le amo e le odio allo stesso tempo. - Già.

translation.en: What just happened?
So get this. I heard Megan's doing her mitzvah project next weekend.
translation.it: Megan farà il suo progetto Mitzvah nel week-end.

translation.en: She's passing out sunscreen at Coachella. -What? Wow. -[Stacy] So cool.
translation.it: - Distribuirà crema solare al Coachella. - Cosa? Wow.

translation.en: Guys, I have to come up with something amazing. This is so much pressure.
translation.it: Devo inventare qualcosa di pazzesco. Quanta pressione.

translation.en: How long do you think it takes to become a social activist influencer on TikTok?
translation.it: Quanto ci vuole per diventare attivisti sociali su TikTok?

translation.en: Uh, six months?
Too long. [sighing]
You know what? We just need to chill our brains.
What are you doing Saturday? My mom's out of town this weekend.
translation.it: Che fate sabato, sfigate? Sarò da sola.

translation.en: Why? You gonna throw a party? A dork party?
What if I did?
Well, I mean, my dad's out of town.
Now, you could actually throw a party.
You could invite the whole seventh grade and not exclude anybody.
translation.it: Con tutta la seconda media, nessuno escluso.

translation.en: Oh, come on. Wouldn't it be fun to exclude people instead of being excluded for once?
translation.it: Invece sarebbe bello escludere, anziché esserlo noi come sempre.

translation.en: [Andy] Heads up!
[Lydia] Ay dios mío. Stace, Stace, Stace, Stace? Are you okay?
translation.it: Ay, Dios mío. Stace? Stai bene?

translation.en: -[kids gasping] -Oh shit.
That doesn't look good. You have grass in your hair.
translation.it: - Non la vedo bene. - Hai l'erba tra i capelli.

translation.en: [Mateo] Stacy. Are you okay?
[Andy] That's my bad!
You good?
Yeah. Sorry about that.
-Have some water. -[music stops]
Oh my God. That was perfect. He went… And then you went.
translation.it: Oddio. È stato perfetto. Ha fatto… E tu…

translation.en: -You guys are meant to be. -[Stacy chuckling]
Hey, are your legs okay, Nikki?
They're fine, Mateo. Just relax.
[Lydia] Really?
Oh, by the way, Dad invited the dry cleaner to the Bat Mitzvah, Stacy.
translation.it: Papà ha invitato il tizio della tintoria al bat mitzvah, Stacy.

translation.en: What? No, that's so unfair.
The ratio to old people to normal people is already so unbalanced.
translation.it: Il rapporto tra vecchi e normali è già squilibrato.

translation.en: Why is that kid Mateo going to Hebrew school?
translation.it: Perché quel Mateo va alla scuola ebraica?

translation.en: Maybe he wanted to convert and take some Jewish holidays off?
translation.it: Forse si è convertito per fare le vacanze ebraiche?

translation.en: [Lydia] You gonna invite him, Stace?
Mateo? No, I barely know him.
You know, if you invite Mateo, Andy might come.
translation.it: Se lo inviti, forse verrà anche Andy.

translation.en: Have fun learning!
Love you!
Are you on dru--
-[boy] Thank you. -[Lydia] Good job, guys.
-Shalom, you two. -Shalom.
[Lydia] Oh, this looks really good. I am not that creative…
translation.it: Guarda, che bello. - Io non ero così creativa. - Neanch'io.

translation.en: I was not good at arts and crafts, like, at all.
translation.it: - Io non ero così creativa. - Neanch'io.

translation.en: -I like your outfit, Ashley. -Thank you.
Oh yeah, it's really cute.
[girl] Look who's coming out of the make out closet. [Stacy] Oh my God, were they hooking up in there?
translation.it: - Chi esce dallo stanzino delle pomiciate? - Stai scherzando?

translation.en: How do they not get caught? There's literally so many people around.
translation.it: Come fanno a non farsi beccare? C'è così tanta gente.

translation.en: Would you believe when I was your age, I was in a Jewish rock and roll band?
translation.it: Ci credereste che alla vostra età ero in una rock band ebraica?

translation.en: We called ourselves Exodus because Genesis was already taken.
translation.it: Ci chiamavamo Exodus, perché i Genesis esistevano già.

translation.en: I'm sorry, Aaron, am I boring you? [Aaron] What? No-- I was listening, Cantor Jerry.
translation.it: - Scusa, Aaron, ti sto annoiando? - Cosa? No, Cantore Jerry.

translation.en: [Nikki] Stace, Lyd!
-You look so cute. You guys good? -[Nikki] Yes.
-The pole! -Pole!
Oh, wait, how's your Torah portion going? It's like 6,000 pages long.
translation.it: - Come va la porzione della Torah? - Saranno 6.000 pagine.

translation.en: Why did my parents pick the third week of August?
translation.it: Perché i miei hanno scelto metà agosto?

translation.en: But mine's literally, like, a minute and a half long. Thank you, June 10th!
translation.it: La mia dura un minuto e mezzo. Grazie, dieci giugno!

translation.en: Chop-chop, ladies! Curtain's up in five!
translation.it: Forza, belle! Su il sipario tra cinque minuti!

translation.en: I like to think of Hebrew school as a little performance I give.
translation.it: Mi piace pensare alla scuola ebraica come a una performance.

translation.en: Your prayer book is the playbill, and I'm the star, cutie-pops.
translation.it: Il libro di preghiere è il cartellone, e io sono una star bambolina

translation.en: Giving you a bit of the ole razzle-dazzle. You know what I'm saying?
translation.it: che vi regala un po' di sana stravaganza. Capito?

translation.en: Kidding. Come one, class is starting. Let's go!
[girl 2] Rabbi Rebecca!
-Can we please have snacks? -You want some latkes and gefilte fish?
translation.it: - Rabbina Rebecca! - Possiamo mangiare? - Latkes e gefilte fish? - È forte.

translation.en: She's insane.
translation.it: - Latkes e gefilte fish? - È forte.

translation.en: I know. I love her. [giggling]
"And I'm the star, cutie-pops, razzle-dazzle."
translation.it: Sono una star che vi regala stravaganza.

translation.en: -Very nice. -Very good.
Thank you. Thank you very much.
-Is she serious? Oh my God. -I know, right?
translation.it: - Sul serio? Oh, mio Dio. - Lo so.

translation.en: I really want a cloud. Like, I want to taste a cloud.
translation.it: Voglio una nuvola. Voglio assaggiare una nuvola.

translation.en: -You want what? -I want to taste a cloud.
I want to taste a cloud. That's all.
-[Lydia] It seems-- -[Andy] Yo. You good, bro?
Yeah. Why?
Uh, your head from earlier. Head injuries are no joke.
translation.it: Per la pallonata di prima. Può essere pericoloso.

translation.en: One time I barfed at soccer from a concussion.
translation.it: Una volta ho vomitato per una commozione cerebrale.

translation.en: Did you barf?
No. I didn't.
Tight.
-All right, shabbat shalom! -[class] Shabbat shalom.
[Rebecca] How's everyone feeling? We having the time of our lives right now?
translation.it: Come state tutti? Vi state divertendo da morire?

translation.en: You guys start your mitzvah projects yet?
-[class] No. -Yeah.
No? It's the most important part of this whole thing.
translation.it: No? È la parte più importante di tutta questa avventura.

translation.en: It's when you do something menschie for your community, for society at-large.
translation.it: È quando si fa qualcosa di menschie per la comunità, la società in generale.

translation.en: What? You guys don't care about society at-large?
translation.it: Cosa? Non vi importa della società in generale?

translation.en: -[class] No. -Yeah.
All right, how about we pick up where we left off with our old buddy, David.
translation.it: Ok, riprendiamo da dove abbiamo lasciato il nostro vecchio amico, David.

translation.en: Remember him? Homeboy was about to get his groove on with the foxy Bathsheba
translation.it: Lo ricordate? Stava per andare a segno con l'affascinante Betsabea,

translation.en: even though she was married to someone else.
translation.it: anche se lei era sposata con un altro.

translation.en: [scoffing] What a snake David is! You a snake, Aaron?
translation.it: Che serpe che è David! E tu sei una serpe, Aaron?

translation.en: N-no.
You ever pull something like that? Cheat on your wife?
-M-me? -Dude, I'm messing around with you. Relax!
translation.it: - Io? - Ti sto prendendo in giro. Rilassati!

translation.en: You're sweating, my goodness. You're not a snake, Aaron. You're awesome.
translation.it: Caspita, stai sudando. Non sei una serpe, Aaron. Sei fantastico.

translation.en: Look at that arm hair and mustache coming in strong. Baruch HaShem, Aaron. Let's go.
translation.it: Guarda i peli sul braccio e i baffi. Baruch hashem, Aaron. Andiamo.

translation.en: [Gabi] So I told the sales lady, "I'll take one in each color."
translation.it: Ho detto alla commessa: "Uno per colore".

translation.en: And she said, "Are you getting a divorce?" And I said, "How'd you guess?"
translation.it: Lei: "Sta divorziando?" E io: "Come l'ha capito?"

translation.en: That's really funny, Mom.
Hey, can you let me bring over some people on Saturday? Oh sure. Like a playdate?
translation.it: - Posso invitare gente a casa, sabato? - Sì. Una serata giochi?

translation.en: A playdate? Mom, I'm 13. Please don't call it a playdate.
translation.it: Mamma, ho 13 anni. Ti prego, non chiamarla così.

translation.en: My dad's calling me. Hi!
translation.it: Mi sta chiamando mio padre. Ciao!

translation.en: Hey! Stacels. Hey, I'm at the store right now. Mommy told me you need some, uh, tampons…
translation.it: Ehi, Stacels, la mamma mi ha mandato a comprarti gli assorbenti,

translation.en: -But I'm not sure what size you use-- -Stop. Get whatever.
translation.it: - ma la misura… - Prendili come vuoi.

translation.en: [Danny] There's a lot of whatever to choose from. Do pads. I don't care.
translation.it: - Ce ne sono tanti. - Quelli che vuoi, non importa.

translation.en: What kind of flow do you got going?
-Uh, heavy flow situation? -Heavy.
-Oh my God. -A light flow? Or extra chunky?
I… I… I got confused. I'm getting peanut butter also.
translation.it: Scusa, serve anche il burro di arachidi.

translation.en: -[Stacy] I mean-- -Mommy said it was a high-alert situation?
translation.it: La mamma ha parlato di allerta rossa.

translation.en: That you might have to sleep in the bathtub? I'll drop 'em off in your room immediately.
translation.it: Dovrai dormire nella vasca da bagno? Li lascio in camera tua.

translation.en: Oh my God. Love you. Bye.
"Hey, Lyd, it's Kym. Having people over now."
translation.it: Ehi, Lyd, sono Kym. C'e un po' di gente da me.

translation.en: "Pull up if you're free."
Um, what do I say?
Do you want to go?
But, I mean, I should respond.
Yeah. For sure. Uh, if you want to go, I don't care.
translation.it: Certo. Se vuoi andarci, a me non importa.

translation.en: I just think they're awful, but it's your choice.
translation.it: Io le trovo orribili, ma è una tua scelta.

translation.en: -Let me ask if you can come. -No. Please don't do that.
translation.it: - Le chiedo se puoi venire. - No!

translation.en: Yeah, I'm gonna ask. Doing it right now. Look, I just did it. Whoops. Sorry.
translation.it: Sì, glielo chiedo. L'ho appena fatto. Ops. Scusa.

translation.en: Oh my God! Okay, Mom, can you drop us off at Kym Chang-Cohen's house, please?
translation.it: Oddio! Mamma, Ci lasci a casa di Kym Chang Cohen, per favore?

translation.en: -Wait. Can you stop by my place first? -[Gabi] Sure.
translation.it: - Possiamo passare prima da me? - Certo.

translation.en: -[mouthing] Period. -You gonna ask if Tara and Nikki can come?
translation.it: - Il ciclo. - Inviterete anche Tara e Nikki?

translation.en: [Lydia] Oh.
Oh. Um, I mean, I don't think so. Bringing three people would be, like, a lot.
translation.it: Non credo proprio. Portare tre persone sarebbe troppo.

translation.en: -Yeah, I agree. -Yeah.
Okay. Hurry.
-Hi, Ron. -[Ronnie] Hi.
-Should I wear a jacket with this? -No. Where are you going?
translation.it: - Aggiungo una giacca? - No. Dove vai?

translation.en: Kym Chang-Cohen's.
Oh wow. First rule of going to a cool kid's house, don't disagree. Don't get too excited.
translation.it: Wow. Regole a casa di fighetti: mai dissentire, mai sovreccitarsi.

translation.en: -Got it. Thanks. -Cool.
[Ronnie] Oh, Dad left pads on your bed. They're enormous. I almost thought they were pillows.
translation.it: Papà ha lasciato gli assorbenti sul letto. Sembrano dei cuscini.

translation.en: Are you joking?
[Lydia laughing] That's funny.
[Lydia squealing] Oh my God.
[Stacy] Remember. Don't disagree. Don't get too excited.
translation.it: Ok. Mai dissentire e mai sovreccitarsi.

translation.en: So, Lydia, any crushes?
No, not really. There's not a lot of options for boys in our grade.
translation.it: No. Non ci sono molte opzioni tra i ragazzi della nostra età.

translation.en: -You know? -[both chuckling awkwardly]
Oh, so you only like boys?
translation.it: Oh, ti piacciono solo i ragazzi?

translation.en: Uh, I think so. Don't worry. Some of us are straight too.
translation.it: - Beh, sì. - Anche alcune di noi sono etero.

translation.en: Cool.
I don't disagree.
Yeah, Stacy, what about you? Who do you like?
translation.it: Già. Stacy, e tu? Chi ti piace?

translation.en: Uh, no one, really.
Uh, people are coming to my house tomorrow if you want to come. Nothing big.
translation.it: Domani verrà gente da me, se volete unirvi. Niente di che.

translation.en: Sounds chill.
You guys have to come. It'll be freaking amazing! Her house is so cool.
translation.it: Dovete venire. Sarà fantastico! Casa sua è spettacolare.

translation.en: I mean, it'll be a'ight.
[clearing throat] Uh, anyways, we should probably wash this off before we go.
translation.it: Comunque dovremmo lavarci il viso prima di andare.

translation.en: -Uh, we have to change before we leave. -Where are we going?
To the ledge.
-No way. -We'll be careful.
I don't want to die.
-We have to. We can't disagree. -What?
Don't act excited!
[Kym] Andy will be there.
Come on, Lydia, can't you do this for me? I already got you invited here. Isn't that enough?
translation.it: - Non puoi farlo per me? - Ti ho già portata qui. Non basta?

translation.en: I didn't mean it like that.
You guys coming or what?
Yeah, I'm down.
Ugh, my mom said I have to wait a year before I can get lip filler.
translation.it: Mamma dice di aspettare per il filler.

translation.en: She said you can have Botox. Just use that on your lips.
translation.it: Ma sulle labbra puoi usare il Botox.

translation.en: [girl] Yeah.
Look who's here!
[Andy] What up, what up?
What's good?
Hi, Stacy. Hey, Mateo.
Yo, we just had soccer, and we kicked St. Catherine's ass, 3-0.
translation.it: Abbiamo fatto il mazzo alla St. Catherine, tre a zero.

translation.en: Even though their field sucks. Yeah, that field is so lopsided.
translation.it: - E il loro campo fa schifo. - Sì, è davvero sbilenco.

translation.en: Exactly.
how's your head?
It's, um… it's still on her body, so…
Yeah, we love that.
And I'm not barfing, so, yeah.
translation.it: E non sto vomitando, quindi… Già.

translation.en: Uh, anyways…
What's up? I'm Andy.
Uh, I know. We, uh… we go to Hebrew school together. Lydia.
translation.it: Lo so. Andiamo alla stessa scuola. Lydia.

translation.en: We do?
Yeah.
[Aaron] I dare one of you guys to jump in! Come on! Let's go.
translation.it: Sfido uno di voi a tuffarsi! Forza! Andiamo.

translation.en: [Mateo] Jump off the ledge, Aaron? You'd break both legs on impact and your spine.
translation.it: Tuffarsi dalla scogliera? Puoi spezzarti le gambe e la schiena.

translation.en: Yeah, I heard Melissa Quinto's cousin jumped, and she now has to text with her nose, so, no.
translation.it: La cugina di Melissa Quinto l'ha fatto e ora scrive col naso, quindi no.

translation.en: Looks like it might be fun.
Hey, I'd jump if I didn't have my contacts in. Oh, I'd be happy to hold them for you, Aaron.
translation.it: - Io lo farei, ma ho le lenti a contatto. - Posso tenertele io, Aaron.

translation.en: Oh shit. You can't see.
I'll do it.
What?
[Andy] You'd jump in? That… that's sick.
Let's see it.
Okay.
-No way, no way. -Oh shit.
[Aaron] If she jumps, it's my idea, guys.
translation.it: Se lo fa, è stata una mia idea.

translation.en: [boy] We don't know if that's shallow.
translation.it: Non sappiamo se l'acqua è bassa.

translation.en: -She's not gonna do it. -She's not gonna do it.
translation.it: - Non lo farà. - Certo che no.

translation.en: -If she dies, we weren't here. -Hell no.
-[girl] She's a scaredy-cat. -[boy] She's stalling.
Stacy, you said we'd be careful. Please. Is Andy watching?
translation.it: - Stacy, dovevamo stare attente. Ti prego. - Andy sta guardando?

translation.en: Everyone is watching!
Friedman! Yo, you got this! Let's go!
-[Andy] Let's get it! -Stacy, do not do this to me.
If you die, your parents will kill me. I swear to God. Stacy! No!
translation.it: Se muori, i tuoi mi uccideranno. Giuro su Dio, Stacy! No!

translation.en: -Oh my God! -Holy shit!
-My God! -Oh my God!
[Lydia] Stacy!
-Stacy! -Oh shit!
[girl] That was unreal!
-[boy] Stacy! -Woohoo!
-That was my idea! -Yo, shut up!
Yo, Stacy Friedman! You're a fricken' legend!
translation.it: Ehi, Stacy Friedman! Sei una leggenda, cazzo!

translation.en: That's how I do it!
What is that?
[Andy] Oh, disgusting.
Yo, Stacy just turned the ledge into the Red Sea.
translation.it: Stacy ha trasformato la scogliera nel Mar Rosso.

translation.en: [Anya] Chill out.
It's just a period, guys. It happens every month.
translation.it: È il ciclo. Capita ogni mese.

translation.en: That looks like two months.
You couldn't deal with having a period, Aaron. Yeah, you punk.
translation.it: - Tu non sopporteresti il ciclo, Aaron. - Idiota.

translation.en: Wait, what'd I even do?
Thanks for laughing with everyone.
translation.it: Grazie per aver riso anche tu.

translation.en: I wasn't laughing.
Yes, you were.
Stacy, it's not that big of a deal. Just take my sweatshirt.
translation.it: Stacy, non è una tragedia. Prendi la mia felpa.

translation.en: Not a big deal? That was humiliating! Andy looked at me like--
translation.it: No? È stato umiliante! Andy mi guardava come…

translation.en: You're a badass! That's all anyone was thinking.
translation.it: Come una tosta! E anche gli altri.

translation.en: No, whatever. I'm over him.
translation.it: No, non importa. Non mi piace più.

translation.en: Call it.
-Stacy, think this through. -I did. Call it.
translation.it: - Stacy, pensaci bene. - Già fatto. Orario.

translation.en: Stacy Friedman's crush on Andy Goldfarb has ended.
translation.it: La cotta di Stacy Friedman per Andy Goldfarb è morta.

translation.en: Time of death, 5:23 p.m. Okay, let's just go.
translation.it: - Ora del decesso: 17:23. - Ok, ora andiamo.

translation.en: No, you just stay with your new friends. What? What are you talking about?
translation.it: - No, resta coi tuoi nuovi amici. - Di cosa stai parlando?

translation.en: Oh my God, stop! You didn't have my back. Just admit it!
translation.it: Dai! Non mi hai difesa. Ammettilo!

translation.en: You stop. I told you not to jump. I didn't even want to be here.
translation.it: Ho detto di non tuffarti. E non volevo venire.

translation.en: Only because you already got them to come to your party!
-You're being so dramatic right now! -You're such a wannabe right now!
translation.it: - Sei melodrammatica! - E tu sei un'arrivista!

translation.en: I'm freezing. I'm gonna go. Wow, Stacy. I can't even.
translation.it: - Sto congelando. Vado. - Stacy, non ti capisco.

translation.en: I can't even, even more.
[Danny] What you gonna do, sweets? [Bree] Sending out the invitations today.
translation.it: - Che devi fare, tesoro? - Mandare gli inviti.

translation.en: I have to get my hair dyed-- Oh, will you call DJ Schmuley? He's asking for a green room and per diem.
translation.it: E fare la tinta. Chiami tu DJ Schmuley? Ha chiesto un camerino e una diaria.

translation.en: And he may or may not have hit on me.
translation.it: E forse ci ha provato con me.

translation.en: Well, I may or may not punch him in the face.
translation.it: Io forse gli darò un bel pugno.

translation.en: -Yeah, okay. [chuckling] -Let me handle Schmuley.
translation.it: - Sì, ok. - Mi occupo io di lui.

translation.en: So, you, I'm going to the movies. You want to come?
translation.it: Ehi, io vado al cinema. Vuoi venire?

translation.en: Too weird being at a movie theater alone with my dad.
translation.it: È strano andarci col proprio padre.

translation.en: Okay, you never want to be with me again? What are you gonna do all day?
translation.it: Non vuoi più uscire con me? E cosa farai?

translation.en: Zaara's coming over, and we're going to online shop and then take a nap outside.
translation.it: Passerà Zaara. Faremo shopping online e un pisolino all'aperto.

translation.en: And that's not weird to you? We're tired from frickin' school all week!
translation.it: - Questo non è strano? - Una settimana di scuola ci stanca!

translation.en: Honey, go have quality time with your younger daughter who still loves you.
translation.it: Tesoro, vai al cinema con la figlia che ti adora ancora.

translation.en: -[Danny] Yeah. -Okay? Have a good day.
This one scares me.
-Miss you already, Daddy! -[Danny] Do ya? Great.
translation.it: - Mi manchi già, papà! - Sì? Fantastico.

translation.en: Oh my God!
-We ready in there, buddy? -[Stacy] One second, Dad!
translation.it: - Sei pronta, bella? - Un secondo, papà!

translation.en: Don't do this to me. Let's go!
[Stacy] Coming!
[Danny] Bubie, I'm psyched.
I'm psyched about the popcorn. Lots of butter.
translation.it: Non vedo l'ora dei popcorn. Con tanto burro.

translation.en: Lots of anger after I finish it.
-Lots of oil on my face. -Dad, can I skip the movies?
translation.it: - Tanto unto in faccia. - Posso saltare il cinema?

translation.en: You wanna skip the movie? How come? You don't want to be seen with me either?
translation.it: Come mai? Neanche tu vuoi essere vista con me?

translation.en: No, no, no. I just need to talk to Lydia. Can you drop me at her house?
translation.it: No, ma devo parlare con Lydia. Puoi lasciarmi da lei?

translation.en: Sure, buddy.
What's the matter? Something bugging you?
It'll be fine. Whatever it is.
Here. Don't tell your mother. Have some coffee.
translation.it: Vuoi del caffè? Non dirlo a tua madre.

translation.en: One sip… [yelling] I gotcha. -[laughing] -Gotcha.
-[Danny] All right. Have fun. I love you. -[Stacy] Thank you. Love you.
translation.it: - Divertiti. Ti voglio bene. - Grazie. Anch'io.

translation.en: I'll just be all alone at the movies, crying and eating a bucket of Sour Patch Kids!
translation.it: Sarò tutto solo al cinema a piangere e a mangiare un secchio di gommose!

translation.en: -A'ight! -[Danny] Okay. Text me if you need me.
translation.it: - Ve bene! - Ok. Scrivimi se hai bisogno.

translation.en: I will!
-[girl] Oh. Uh, Stacy, you would know. -Uh, how do you turn on the jacuzzi jets?
translation.it: - Stacy, tu lo saprai. - Come si attiva l'idromassaggio?

translation.en: Uh, the switch is in the pantry.
-The pantry? -Pantry?
Oh my God.
Oh my God.
-[Lydia] Stacy! Stacy! -[Aaron] Oh, snap. Yo, shit just got real. [chuckling]
translation.it: - Stacy! - Oh, cavolo. Sta partendo un dramma.

translation.en: [Lydia] Stacy.
Stacy, he kissed me!
You don't even like him!
You're like David and Bathsheba, and you're the snake.
translation.it: Sei come Betsabea, sei una serpe.

translation.en: -I'm sorry, okay. I-- -Stop talking!
Let me explain? Please? I haven't done anything.
